籤詩版本二:
Lin Wei ingwe inorinda suo.Anofanira kuva nesimba uye kwete kukuvadza vamwe.
Zvinonyatsotaurwa kuti hapana kudzivirira.Kunetseka, kuzeza, kutya uye kutya zviri musango → huni.
詩意:
Mune iyi hexagram, miti yesango uye tiger zvine mufananidzo une simba.
Ma alarm ese enhema haanyanyi kuitika.
解曰: Chitofu chinobatidza sinou. Sokuti mhepo yawira panzeve dzisinganzwe. Inogona kuva chikomborero. Zvinhu zvakanaka zvinotevera uye zvakaipa zvinoitika pamberi pazvo.
籤詩故事一:
◇Pang Hong anotya Bao Gong
Renzong yeRwiyo Dynasty. Bao Gong ndiye gavhuna weKaifeng Prefecture (zita repamutemo, rakaenzana nemukuru). Pang Hong aive tezvara (mukuwasha wamambo) uye akasunga General Di Qing. Apo Bao Gong akakumbira kutongwa pamusoro penyaya iyi, Pang Hong akatya uye akaivhara nenzira dzakawanda. Gare gare, nyaya yacho yakabuda pachena uye kupomera kwenhema kwaPang Hong kwakasimbiswa. Akaendeswa kumutemo wamambo Renzong weRwiyo Dynasty uye akasunungurwa nekuda kwehama dzake.
聖意: Kusagadzikana pamba, mashoko emunhu pachake, kukumbira mari, bhizinesi remuipi, muchato usingafadzi, Liujia inishuwarenzi yenhema, kuvharidzira vafambi, kukuvadzwa nemakonye esirika, kukuvara kwezvipfuyo zvitanhatu, kushaikwa, mhosva yeruzhinji, kurasikirwa, kutama, kuchengetedza, kurasikirwa nepfuma, kurwara, kuzvipira. , Hushani guva, akaipa
